summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Amanda Kirby, Vahe Stepanian, and Tazia Paul regarding ISDAs related to Epstein. Amanda mentions reaching out to Jeanne to check on accounts and expresses hope that JPM has consolidated the accounts.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is mentioned as an associate in the Markets Coverage Group at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the sender of the email, discussing ISDAs and account consolidation related to Epstein.

persons.name: Tazia Paul
persons.context: Tazia Paul is mentioned as a recipient of the email from Amanda Kirby.

persons.name: Jeanne
persons.context: Jeanne is mentioned as a contact Amanda reached out to regarding SFLLC accounts.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 26th Floor, New York, NY
keyFacts: The email discusses ISDAs related to Epstein.
Amanda Kirby reached out to Jeanne to check on SFLLC accounts.
There is hope that JPM has consolidated the accounts.
